display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 86px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 加锁和解锁不需要CAS操作，没有额外的性能消耗，和执行非同步方法相比仅存在纳秒级的差距

switch.text: 加锁和解锁不需要CAS操作，没有额外的性能消耗，和执行非同步方法相比仅存在纳秒级的差距

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 346px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 如果线程间存在锁竞争，会带来额外的锁竞争的消耗

switch.text: 如果线程间存在锁竞争，会带来额外的锁竞争的消耗

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 596px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 只有一个线程访问同步块或者同步方法的场景

switch.text: 只有一个线程访问同步块或者同步方法的场景

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 竞争的线程不会阻塞，提高了响应速度

switch.text: 竞争的线程不会阻塞，提高了响应速度

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 346px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 若线程长时间抢不到锁，自旋会消耗CPU性能

switch.text: 若线程长时间抢不到锁，自旋会消耗CPU性能

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 596px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 线程交替执行同步块或者同步方法的场景

switch.text: 线程交替执行同步块或者同步方法的场景

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 线程竞争使用自旋，不会消耗CPU

switch.text: 线程竞争使用自旋，不会消耗CPU

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 346px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 线程阻塞，响应时间缓慢，在多线程下，频繁的获取释放锁，会带来巨大的性能消耗

switch.text: 线程阻塞，响应时间缓慢，在多线程下，频繁的获取释放锁，会带来巨大的性能消耗

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 596px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 追求吞吐量，同步块或者同步方法执行时间较长的场景

switch.text: 追求吞吐量，同步块或者同步方法执行时间较长的场景
